<properties pageTitle="a7b560c5-6971-418d-8ac4-a350254e9e2b" description="c7267341-ffef-4b07-aef0-24f6a2c03420" services="mobile-services" documentationCenter="android" authors="RickSaling" manager="dwrede" editor=""/>

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: MobileServiceClient mClient = new MobileServiceClient( "MobileServiceUrl", // Replace with the above Site URL "AppKey", // replace with the Application Key this)
MobileServiceTable<ToDoItem> mToDoTable = mClient.getTable(ToDoItem.class);
MobileServiceTable<ToDoItem> mToDoTable = mClient.getTable("ToDoItemBackup", ToDoItem.class);
mToDoTable.where().year("due").eq(2013).execute().get();
mToDoTable.where().startsWith("text", "PRI0").execute().get();
mToDoTable.where().field("duration").mod(2).eq(0).execute().get();
mToDoTable.where().year("due").eq(2013).and().startsWith("text", "PRI0") .execute().get();
mToDoTable.where() .year("due").eq(2013) .and (startsWith("text", "PRI0").or().field("duration").gt(10)) .execute().get();

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Exploring the richness of the Mobile Services Android client query model
Exploring the richness of the Mobile Services Android client query model

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: mToDoTable.orderBy("text", QueryOrder.Ascending).execute().get();
final MobileServiceList<ToDoItem> result = mToDoTable.top(5).execute().get();
mToDoTable.skip(5).top(5).execute().get();
mToDoTable.select("complete", "text").execute().get();

mToDoTable.where().year("due").eq(2013) .and().startsWith("text", "PRI0") .or().field("duration").gt(10) .select("id", "complete", "text", "duration") .orderBy(duration, QueryOrder.Ascending).top(20) .execute().get();
// Get the Mobile Service Json Table to use mJsonToDoTable = mClient.getTable("ToDoItem");
jsonObject.getAsJsonPrimitive("id").getAsInt());
mToDoTable.delete(item);
mToDoTable.delete(ID);
<ListView android:id="@+id/listViewToDo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" tools:listitem="@layout/row_list_to_do" > </ListView>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="horizontal"> <CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkToDoItem" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/checkbox_text" /> </LinearLayout>
public class ToDoItemAdapter extends ArrayAdapter<ToDoItem> {
ToDoItemAdapter mAdapter; mAdapter = new ToDoItemAdapter(this, R.layout.row_list_to_do);
ListView listViewToDo = (ListView) findViewById(R.id.listViewToDo); listViewToDo.setAdapter(mAdapter);
mToDoTable = mClient.getTable("ToDoItemBackup", ToDoItem.class);
